name: Nightshimmer
summary: a darkblue scheme with shimmering colors
description:
This is a calm, soothing color scheme for silent nights and other magic moments. It reminds me a little of Monkey Island, or of Sandman. Or of something I've found in a dream.

Here's a screenshot: http://protean.freezope.org/pub/files/vim/screenshots/nightshimmer-01.png

I hope you like it!
install_details:
In Vim 6, simply drop this into your "$VIMRUNTIME/colors/" or "$HOME/.vim/colors/", then use ":colorscheme nightshimmer-theme". Otherwise, just ":source" it.

(The script might work fine in Vim 5.7 as well.)
